mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon (coupon_name, discount_type, discount_value, min_order_amount, discount_amount, start_date, end_date, is_active) VALUES (#{couponName}, #{discountType}, #{discountValue}, #{minOrderAmount}, #{discountAmount}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{isActive})
mapper.update: UPDATE coupon SET coupon_name = #{couponName}, discount_type = #{discountType}, discount_value = #{discountValue}, min_order_amount = #{minOrderAmount}, discount_amount = #{discountAmount}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, is_active = #{isActive} WHERE coupon_id = #{couponId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM coupon ORDER BY coupon_id DESC
